Plot: Two children conceived by artificial insemination bring their biological father into their non-traditional family life.
Title: The Kids Are All Right
Actors: Julianne Moore, Annette Bening, Mark Ruffalo, Mia Wasikowska
tomatoConsensus: Worthwhile as both a well-acted ensemble piece and as a smart, warm statement on family values, The Kids Are All Right is remarkable.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 29 wins & 114 nominations.
